projects.name: Intelligent Device Orchestration & Real-Time Monitoring System
projects.description: A technology-focused platform designed to connect, monitor, and control multiple smart devices in real time. The system integrates IoT sensors, edge processing, and cloud-based analytics to deliver continuous status updates, automated alerts, and intelligent decision-making. It allows users to orchestrate device operations through a unified dashboard, schedule automated tasks, detect anomalies using data patterns, and remotely manage system health. This project showcases strong technical engineering: hardwareâ€“software integration, scalable APIs, real-time data streaming, and secure communication protocols.

tasks.text: Set up product, vendor, and warehouse schemas + build CRUD APIs.
Implement low-stock detection logic and auto-purchase-order triggers.
Build the admin dashboard with inventory charts and workflow automation controls.

projects.name: Smart Inventory & Workflow Automation Platform
projects.description: A full-stack platform that helps product companies track inventory, automate restocking, and streamline internal workflows. The system collects real-time product movement data, predicts low-stock scenarios using analytics, and triggers automated purchase orders. It includes an admin dashboard for product lifecycle management, vendor tracking, and warehouse monitoring. The platform also provides alerts, role-based access control, and visual reports to help product teams reduce downtime and prevent stockouts.

tasks.text: Connect IoT devices to a backend via MQTT/REST and store real-time sensor data.
Implement anomaly detection alerts + device automation rules.
Build a control panel UI for monitoring status, issuing commands, and viewing logs.

projects.name: AI-Driven Sales Lead Management & Conversion Booster
projects.description: A sales-oriented CRM solution that helps businesses capture leads, score them using AI, and boost conversions with automated follow-ups. The system integrates customer touchpoints (forms, calls, emails), assigns lead priority using behavioral and demographic insights, and routes leads to the right sales reps. It provides real-time analytics dashboards, conversion funnels, meeting tracking, and performance monitoring for sales teams. The goal is simple: close deals faster and smarter with data-backed decisions.

tasks.text: Create lead capture API + integration hooks for forms/emails.
Implement lead-scoring module using simple ML or rule-based weighting.
Build sales funnel dashboard with filters, charts, and team performance stats.
